quote: In the ninja world, those who break the rules are scum, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.
If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future!
The only thing we’re allowed to do is to believe that we won’t regret the choice we made.
A lesson without pain is meaningless. That's because you can't gain something without sacrificing something else.
Being alone is better than being with the wrong person.
A lesson learned from life is never to trust anyone too much, not even your own shadow.
It's fine now. Why? Because I am here!
It’s not the world that’s messed up; it’s those of us in it.
Go ahead and live with your head held high, no matter what’s happening around you!
When you die, you'll be alone.
"work hard is the only thing make you stronger"
